definition: (old) dowager/old lady (title for the mother of a noble or an official)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

definition: wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
in Qing dynasty, Manchurian word for wife
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
